title: Human Resources Officer Job at Sales Force Consulting
content:
Sales Force Consulting - Our client is into production of cellotape adhesive tapes, gums and diverse stationery items. Their factory is located at Agbara Industrial Layout with outlets in Onitsha and key states of Nigeria. Due to an on-going expansion, they are presently recruiting self-motivated candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Officer
Job Location: Agbara, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time
Interview mode: Physical

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Work with HR team to plan and conduct employee recruitments, orientation and all on-boarding activities.
	Work with HR Manager and HODs to set up key performance measurement matrix and indicators for all job functions and ensure planning, monitoring and appraisal of all employee work results periodically.
	Monitor performance appraisal procedures and ensure its compliance.
	Encourage employee communications and provide current and prospective employees with information about policies, job function, working conditions, wages, and opportunities for promotion and employee benefits.
	Ensure proper management of staff resources and maintenance of occupational health safety.


Requirements


	HND / B.Sc / BA.
	1 - 2 years of HR work experience is required
	HR Certification is an advantage.
	Candidate must be a passionate about HR, Peoples Management and Business Sustainability
	They must have worked or is currently working in a well organized company with HR systems and procedures
	Candidate must presently reside with Agbara axis.


Skill Set:


	Ability to work independently with little supervision.
	Attention to details.
	Leadership skills.
	Organizational skills.


Other Conditions:


	Applicants must be very hardworking, target oriented, with high level of integrity


Salary
N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV (PDF or Word) to: salesforceconsultingng@gmail.com using "Human Resources Officer" as the subject of the email.

Note


	For inquiries: send a Text or WhatsApp message to: 08120796570
	Only candidates who meet set criteria shall be shortlisted for interview.

title: Customer Sales Agent Job at ProductHeights Consulting
content:
ProductHeights Consulting - We work with MSMEs owners and entrepreneurs to put systems, structures, processes, policies and procedures for the optimal, efficient and effective running of their businesses. At Productheights consulting, we strive for the best of every business owner.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Sales Agent

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT), Akwa Ibom, Delta, Kwara, Lagos, Osun, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a dynamic and results-driven Customer Sales Agent to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for engaging with prospective and existing customers, promoting our products, and ensuring excellent customer satisfaction.
	You will be the first point of contact for customers, helping them make informed purchase decisions while driving sales and revenue growth.


Key Responsibilities
Customer Interaction:


	Handle inbound and outbound customer inquiries via phone, WhatsApp, email, and other channels.
	Provide detailed information about products and services to prospective customers.
	Respond promptly to customer inquiries and resolve any issues effectively.


Sales & Promotions:


	Promote and sell the company’s products by understanding customer needs and preferences.
	Convert leads from social media platforms (e.g., Facebook and Instagram) into paying customers.
	Upsell and cross-sell additional products to maximize revenue per customer.


Follow-Up & Relationship Building:


	Follow up with potential customers who have shown interest in the products to close sales.
	Build and maintain positive relationships with customers to encourage repeat business.


Record-Keeping & Reporting:


	Document customer details, inquiries, and sales in spreadsheets or CRM systems.
	Track sales metrics and prepare regular reports for management.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND qualification with 0 - 5 years work experience.
	Proven experience in sales, customer service, or a related role.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to build rapport with customers and maintain professionalism.
	Proficiency in using WhatsApp Business, social media, and basic office tools like Excel and Google Sheets.
	Results-oriented with a strong desire to meet and exceed sales targets.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively.


Preferred Skills:


	Experience in the haircare, skincare, or beauty industry is a plus.
	Knowledge of CRM software or other sales tools is an advantage.
	Fluency in local languages is an added benefit.


Work Environment:


	This role may involve working remotely.
	Flexibility to work weekends or evenings as required to meet customer demands.


Salary
N40,000 - N75,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: productheightsconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only female applicants are needed.

title: Social Media Manager Job at Efezi Southsea Nigeria Limited
content:
Efezi Southsea Nigeria Limited, established in 2009, is a hospitality consultancy firm specializing in providing expert services to small and medium-sized hotels.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Key Responsibilities
Strategy Development:


	Plan and execute a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with business goals.
	Identify target audiences and choose appropriate platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, X/Twitter, TikTok, LinkedIn).


Content Creation & Management:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Create, curate, and schedule engaging content (text, images, videos, reels, etc.).
	Maintain a consistent brand voice and visual identity across platforms.


Engagement & Community Management:


	Respond to comments, messages, and inquiries in a timely and professional manner.
	Monitor conversations, trends, and brand mentions online.


Advertising & Promotion:


	Run paid social media campaigns to promote services, offers, or events.
	Optimize ads for performance, reach, and return on investment (ROI).


Analytics & Reporting:


	Track key performance indicators (KPIs) such as reach, engagement, follower growth, and conversions.
	Prepare and present regular performance reports and insights for improvement.


Collaboration:


	Work closely with marketing, design, and sales teams to align efforts.
	Collaborate with influencers or partners for campaigns or events.


Trend Monitoring:


	Stay updated on the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices.
	Recommend innovative ideas to keep the brand competitive online.


Benefits Attached


	Commission– yes
	Layover - yes
	Staff meal - yes.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: efezisouthsea2000@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: All corresponding are via Email

title: Frontend Developer Job at Rehoboth Labs
content:
Rehoboth Labs - We are a forward-thinking technology consultancy dedicated to delivering innovative digital solutions, custom software, and strategic consultancy services. Our mission is to enhance business processes and drive digital transformation across industries, helping organisations streamline operations and achieve sustainable growth in today's competitive marketplace.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Frontend Developer

Job Location:  Nigeria
Employment Type: Contract

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a talented UI Developer to join our team on a contract basis for a period of 2 to 3 months.
	You’ll be working on a modern codebase built with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, contributing to both UI implementation and writing robust test coverage using Vitest (or similar testing frameworks).


What We're Looking For


	Strong hands-on experience with React, Next.js, and TypeScript
	A solid project portfolio that clearly demonstrates your skills and ability to build production-grade applications (personal, freelance, or open-source projects are fine)
	Experience with any modern testing framework (e.g., Jest, Vitest, Testing Library)
	Willingness to learn and adapt quickly, especially with Vitest if you're not already familiar
	Ability to solve problems independently and effectively leverage AI tools to speed up development and improve quality
	Good communication skills – you will be collaborating remotely, so clarity and responsiveness are important
	Access to a reliable internet connection and stable power supply.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 monthly.

title: Health and Safety Officer Job at Dangote Group
content:
Dangote Group is one of Nigeria’s most diversified business conglomerates with a hard – earned reputation for excellent business practices and products’ quality with its operational headquarters in the bustling metropolis of Lagos, Nigeria in West Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Health and Safety Officer
Job Location: Okpella Plant, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	Participate in implementing the DCP approved occupational safety program, analysing and administering various components of the safety programs.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Monitor DCP employees, contracts and sub-contracts to ensure compliance safety rules and regulations.
	Ensure all persons including the general public, with proximity of DCP premises sites and operating locations are not exposed to the risks of health and safety.
	Ensure that work is carries out in a safe manner and acceptable standards with minimum risk to all persons, property, equipment and materials.
	Report near miss, unsafe act, unsafe conditions of contracts and sub-contracts to DCP Management.
	Ensure that contracts carry out toolbox on daily basis before starting of any work.
	Ensure that all necessary fire apparatus on site are maintained in serviceable condition and regular inspected.
	Ensure that necessary contact is made for emergency call out of medical facilities in case of serious accident or illness.
	Upon receipt of a report of noncompliance or any condition which poses a serious or imminent danger to health or health, issues a request for immediate corrective action from the contractors.
	The elimination of risk of injury of all persons affected by DCP operations and prevention of damage to all property and plant. 


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degrees in Engineering or a related field.
	Postgraduate/Professional qualification from an HSE body such as NEBOSH, OSHA, ISPON.
	Minimum of 6 years of experience in safety, preferably in the cement or related industry.


Skills and Behaviors:


	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Adequate knowledge of the cement and manufacturing industries.
	Adequate knowledge of Safety regulations.
	Ability to analyze incidences and proffer valuable solutions.
	Ability to communicate incidences and emergencies clearly.
	Strong organizational skills.
	Basic computer skills.
	High sense of responsibility.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal and presentation skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
